page.title: 18Hyssington Post Office
page.content:
The{sub post office and telephone {kiosk}are situated beside the Village Green. There is a kiosk and post box at Old Churchstoke. Our letters are delivered by mail van from Welshpool about 8am: the post box is emptied at 4-15pm.
